turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hey, can you please order an Iced Caramel Macchiato from Peet's?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Do you want me to order it from the Peet's on Munras in Monterey?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah, that's the closest one.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, cool. Do you want a small, medium, or large?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Get me a large, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay. Did you want them to make it iced or hot?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want it iced, please. Also, can you ask them to make it with almond milk instead of the regular milk they use?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure. I think they add whipped cream though. If they ask, do you want whipped cream on top?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Actually, yeah, that sounds good.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, cool. Do you want any extra shots of espresso or anything?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No thanks. I don't need too much coffee.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, got it. Do you want anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hmm, have you tried anything of the food they serve?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yeah, I have. They make a yummy egg and cheese breakfast sandwich. Do you wanna try it?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Mmm, that does sound good, but I'd rather have something from their bakery.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Oh! If you're feeling a sweet breakfast treat, you should get their chocolate croissants.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Oh my gosh, that sounds delicious. Yeah, order a chocolate croissant and a large iced caramel macchiato at the Peet's in Monterey.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, will do. I'll let you know when it's ready.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Great, thanks!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You're welcome. See you later.
